description:
This course will guide you on:

  1. identifying real constraints and challenges,
  2. solutions to overcome constraints,
  3. managing data
  4. strategic planning as a business need
  5. forecasting process
  6. options on affordable and suitable software models
  7. aligning and balancing divergent aspects in an enterprise

towards achieving business growth in SME

The course will also help to implement certain additional processes in your Enterprise.

The course is structured through lectures on:

  1. Identifying and categorizing true constraints
  2. Manage constraints
  3. Implement Planning & Forecasting processes
  4. Dashboards & Analytics with Variances
  5. Options of software solution models
  6. Balancing - Approach, Data and Software solution

This course will help SMEs to understand gaps and align towards their targeted business growth.

The lectures run for 30 minutes.
title: Basics for Business Growth
